context.text: List of presenters of Best Picture Academy Award - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Ceremony Film Year Date of Ceremony Presenter Best Picture

This is a list of presenters of Best Picture Academy Award . Each year, the Academy Award for Best Picture is presented by one or more artists. Presenters have included actors, actresses, directors, and singers. This list includes many Hollywood icons: Frank Capra, David O. Selznick, Ethel Barrymore, Audrey Hepburn, Elizabeth Taylor, Jack Nicholson, and Warren Beatty. In recent ceremonies, presenters of Best Picture have tended to be past Academy Award winners themselves. Best Picture is the final award presented during the annual ceremonies, as it represents a culmination of all factors that contribute to cinematic excellence. This list is current as of the 80th Academy Awards ceremony held on February 24, 2008.
List of presenters of Best Picture Academy Award
List of presenters of Best Picture Academy Award
